keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The man accused of killing two police officers in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, received guns, cash and instructions from the Islamic State, Saudi officials said.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: ISIS Is Linked to Killings
headline.main: Saudi Arabia Says ISIS Helped a Militant Who Killed Police Officers

snippet: The man accused of killing two police officers in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, received guns, cash and instructions from the Islamic State, Saudi officials said.
abstract: Saudi Arabian officials say Yazid Mohammed Abdulrahman Abu Nayan, Saudi man accused of killing two police officers in drive-by shooting, was aided by Islamic State in Syria.
